data.title: Time difference between United States and Spain
data.meta_description: Information about time zones and time difference between countries United States and Spain. The time shown here apply Daylight Saving Time when required.
data.text:
United States has multiple time zones, that reason we now list some of the most important places with their respective local times. Spain has multiple time zones, that reason we now list some of the most important places with their respective local times.

Distance between United States and Spain

Washington, District of Columbia, United States's latitude is 38.895 and its longitude is -77.036667. Madrid, Spain's latitude is 40.42 and its longitude is -3.7. The distance in kilometers between United States and Spain is 6,089 km.

Traveling from Washington, District of Columbia to Madrid

By car, it would take you approximately 76.11 hours to get to Madrid, Spain driving non-stop from Washington, District of Columbia, United States at a constant speed of 80 kilometers per hour.

By plane, it would take you approximately 10.15 hours to get to Madrid, Spain taking a direct flight from Washington, District of Columbia, United States.
